workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.subtitle: Python. GitHub. Web Development. Generative AI.
workshops.name: Workshops

points.Accessible for All: Our workshops are designed for every skill level — whether you're brand new to data science or diving into advanced topics.
points.Experience Through Practice: We focus on helping students build practical skills and confidence to grow as capable data scientists.
points.Diverse Topics: Sessions cover everything from Exploratory Data Analysis and Scikit-Learn to Generative AI, LLMs, and AI agents.

points.Mentorship: Through our Big-Little mentorship program, members are matched for guidance, friendship, and support—building strong connections across experience levels.
points.Community Beyond Coding: From beach bonfires to game nights, we host events that bring members together for fun, relaxation, and real community.
points.Social Meets Growth: Whether it's ice skating, study jams, or themed mixers, our events help members unwind, engage, and grow alongside fellow data enthusiasts.

points.Grow Your Network: Connect with professionals, alumni, and recruiters through speaker panels, career nights, and exclusive networking events.
points.Build Your Career Toolkit: Strengthen your resume, portfolio, and LinkedIn through interactive workshops on personal branding and professional storytelling.
points.Discover Your Path in Data Science: Explore roles across industry and research, and gain insights on how to turn your skills into meaningful opportunities.
